Events that occurred on 31 July

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1917 â€“ "Tea Cake" Barnsley is killed near Ypres while consoling a captured prisoner.
1924 - Actor Garard Green is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 77.
1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 109.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 223.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 274a.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 311, concerned with his health.
1982 - The third episode of the new version of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1988 - Mythcon 19 in Berkeley, California.
1989 - Mythcon 20 at University of British Columbia, Vancouver.
1993 - Roland Adlerberth dies.
1993 - Mythcon 24 at University of Minnesota, Minneapolis.
1999 - Mythcon 30 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
2001 - Author Poul Anderson dies.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Heinz Hall in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
2004 - Mythcon 35 at University of Michigan in Ann Arbor.
2011 - Picturing Tolkien is published.
2015 - Mythcon 46 in Hotel Elegante, Colorado Springs.
2017 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Mordor expansion is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: Note: Months of the Shire Calendar only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.
